data.name: Object Ward. Demo
data.detailed_description:
Meet Manson Moss, a schizophrenic man who sees everyone with an inanimate object for a head. Due to a certain 'incident', he is sentenced to mandatory rehabilitation in one of New York's most ill-managed psych wards in the year of 1986. He plots his escape, but the eccentric occupants of the Ward can't let him leave—so they get a little friendly with him instead. Help Manson navigate love, psychosis, and countless misadventures in this dark comedy visual novel, Object Ward.

Features:
  • 1800x1200 resolution
  • Partial voice acting
  • Horrible puns
  • 7 CGs and a fully original soundtrack!

Characters:

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/groupphoto2.png

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/groupphoto2.png
data.short_description: Object Ward is a visual novel about the various misadventures of a man who sees everyone with an inanimate object for a head. What is real, and what is a hallucination?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 137 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 137 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 137 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This demo contains depictions of hallucinations and mental illness. There is also vulgar language.
